means: 购买( purchase的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Land is, in most instances, purchased by those who occupy it.
sentence.Network_cn: 在大多数情况下，土地都是由其使用者购得。

sentence.Network_en: Most of those shares were purchased from brokers.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分的股份是从经纪人手中购得的。

sentence.Network_en: Provisions may be purchased from the mini-market.
sentence.Network_cn: 或许能在小型超市里买到日常用品。

PerfectNetExp.abs: on the purchased goodwill accounting treatment ., 外购商誉会计处理的改进.

if toys are purchased for a child without any basis or rule , this may lead the child to become insecure . parents can instead make plans for choosing and buying toys .如不规律或随性地购买玩具给孩子，会养成孩子不易安定的性格，因此可以计划性地替孩子选择及购买玩具。
He purchased this stamp at an auction ., 他在拍卖会中购得这枚邮票.
Most natural rubber must be purchased from British and Dutch combines ., 大部分天然橡胶必须从英国和荷兰的联合企业购进.

土地词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... purchase price 购买价；买价 purchaser 买主；购买人；买方 PVC pipe 硬胶喉管.
英语托业考试词汇大全(WORD版)_百度文库 ... beverage 饮料 11. purchase 购买；购得之物 4. buffet 自助餐 12.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Purchase Order 采购订单 Purchasing 采购 Purchasing Strategy 采购策略.

entry.def: When you purchase something, you buy it.

example.ex: He purchased a ticket and went up on the top deck...
example.tran: 他买了一张票，然后上到顶层甲板。

example.ex: Most of those shares were purchased from brokers.
example.tran: 大部分的股份是从经纪人手中购得的。

entry.def: The purchase of something is the act of buying it.

example.ex: Some of the receipts had been for the purchase of cars.
example.tran: 其中一些收据是购买汽车时开的。

entry.def: A purchase is something that you buy.

example.ex: She opened the tie box and looked at her purchase. It was silk, with maroon stripes.
example.tran: 她打开领带盒，看着她买回的东西：一条带有褐红色条纹的丝制领带。

entry.def: If you get a purchase on something, you manage to get a firm grip on it.

example.ex: I got a purchase on the rope and pulled...
example.tran: 我紧抓住绳子，用力去拉。

example.ex: I couldn't get any purchase with the screwdriver on the damn screws.
example.tran: 我用螺丝刀拧那些该死的螺丝钉时一点也使不上劲儿。

auth_sentence.content: Recently, the bank purchased some smaller Chicago banks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recently, the bank purchased some smaller Chicago banks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recently, the bank purchased some smaller Chicago banks.

auth_sentence.content: Dow Chemical purchased Union Carbide, eight years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dow Chemical purchased Union Carbide, eight years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dow Chemical purchased Union Carbide, eight years ago.

auth_sentence.content: Each of these decorative flourishes was purchased on impulse.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each of these decorative flourishes was purchased on impulse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each of these decorative flourishes was purchased on impulse.

Sentence.sentence: That means users have access to notes from not only their classmates and Facebook friends, but anyone who purchased the book across the country.
After reading a book on how to address for success, he had purchased an expensive dark navy suit and golden tie.
